definitions.title: 1. adj. gent.
definitions.body: Jebusite, Jebusites, sg. [[אורנה הַיְבֻסִי]] 2Sa 24:16, 2Sa 24:18 cf. 1Ch 21:15, 1Ch 21:18, 1Ch 21:28, 2Ch 3:1; as subst. a Jebusite Zec 9:7; usually c. art. ´[[הַי]] coll. the Jebusites, in hist. statement Ge 10:16 (J) = 1Ch 1:14, Nu 13:29 (E) Jos 9:1, Jos 11:3, Jos 12:8, Jos 24:11 (all D) Ju Jdg 3:5, Ne 9:8, all in list of Canaanitish peoples; so also 1Ki 9:20 = 2Ch 8:7, where remnant of these peoples referred to; also Ezr 9:1, which seems to shew that this list had become a standing expression for early inhabitants; cf. further in promises (JED) Ge 15:21, Ex 3:8, Ex 3:17, Ex 13:5, Ex 23:23, Ex 33:2, Ex 34:11, De 7:1, De 20:17, Jos 3:10; specif. defined as inhabitants of Jebus-Jerusalem Jos 15:63, Jos 15:63 (J) Ju Jdg 1:21, Jdg 1:21, 2Sa 5:6, 2Sa 5:8 (on which cf. Dr) 1Ch 11:4 (called also [[יוֹשֵׁב הָאָרֶץ]] 2Sa 5:6 & [[ישְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ]] 1Ch 11:4); v. also [[עִיר הַיְבוּסִי הַזּאׁת]] Ju Jdg 19:11; whence
Jerusalem, Hex only P, Jos 15:8 [[גֵּי בֶן־הִנּׁם אֶל־כֶּתֶף היבוסי מִנֶּגֶב הִיא יְרוּשָׁלָָםִ]], cf. Jos 18:16, Jos 18:28 [[וְהַיְבוּסִי הִיא יְרוּשָׁלִַםִ]].—Cf. [[כנען]].
